Detailed Description

A subclass of AlertBox that can display a progress bar.

The following example demonstrates how to use the ProgressBox. 

  //Create your ProgressBox in your page
  SamplePage : public Page {
    public:
      ProgressBox* mpProgressBox;
      SamplePage();
      virtual ~SamplePage();
      virtual void onInit(Persistence* p);
      virtual void onTear();
      void createProgressBox();
  };

  SamplePage::createProgressBox() {
    // new ProgressBox instance
    mpProgressBox = new ProgressBox(this);

    if (mpProgressBox != NULL) {
      // set ProgressBox cancelable
      mpProgressBox->setCancelable(true);

      // set ProgressBox max progress
      mpProgressBox->setMax(100);

      // set ProgressBox current progress
      mpProgressBox->setProgress(56);

      // set ProgressBox current secondary progress
      mpProgressBox->setSecondaryProgress(63);

      // set ProgressBox Style
      mpProgressBox->setProgressStyle(ProgressBox::STYLE_HORIZONTAL);

      // showing ProgressBox
      Scene* scene = getSceneSingleton();
      if (scene != NULL) {
        scene->showDialog(mpProgressBox);
      }
    }
  }

Definition at line 74 of file ProgressBox.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum gaia::ui::ProgressBox::ProgressStyle

Used to define the style of ProgressBox.

Enumerator:
STYLE_SPINNER 

A ProgressBox with a circular, spinning progress bar.

This is the default.

STYLE_HORIZONTAL 

A ProgressBox with a horizontal progress bar.

void gaia::ui::ProgressBox::setProgressNumberFormat ( const gaia::base::String &  format)

Change the format of the small text showing current and maximum units of progress.

The default is "%1d/%2d". Should not be called during the number is progressing.

Parameters:
formatA string passed to gaia::base::String::format use "%1d" for the current number and "%2d" for the maximum. If null, nothing will be shown.
void gaia::ui::ProgressBox::setProgressStyle ( int32_t  style) const

Set progress style of ProgressBox.

Parameters:
styleIndicate the progress style is STYLE_SPINNER or STYLE_HORIZONTAL
void gaia::ui::ProgressBox::setSecondaryProgress ( int32_t  secondaryProgress)

Set secondary progress value.

Parameters:
secondaryProgressThe value of the progress bar. Only visible in STYLE_HORIZONTAL ProgressBox.
